item.description:
"Lunacy" is the lastest feature from the acclaimed surrealist Czech animator and director Jan Svankmajer. His previous film, "Little Otik" was a disturbing fable of a desperate childless couple who tend to a log (no typo) which has an infant's features which not only becomes alive but turns into quite a gluttonous little monster. It was brilliant and I've been waiting 3 years for his next feature to play in the area.

Adapting the writings of Poe and De Sade , a young man is befriended by a crazed Marquis who initiates him in some of his rituals and and who eventually is taken to an insane asylum.

I should let you know that Svankmajer's imagery at times is grotesque and shocking.
